helper.word

Interface FieldStore<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of data associated with this field
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FieldReader.FieldHandler.FieldStoreInternal

    public interface FieldStore<T>
    Common interface for a single field
    Author:
    Moritz Dorka

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  FieldStore.CharacterRunTuple
      Immutable store for a characterRun with an overridden font name
      static class  FieldStore.FieldIdentifier
      Internal identifiers for different field types
      static class  FieldStore.LinkTuple
      Immutable data store for a textual link
      static class  FieldStore.ShapeTuple
      immutable store for an image which is actually a shape
